lead_paragraph: Brazilian soccer legend Pelé has sued Samsung Electronics Co for at least $30 million, alleging the Korean company improperly used a look-alike in an advertisement that ran in the New York Times without permission.

headline.main: Soccer Legend Pelé Sues Samsung Over Image in Newspaper Ad
headline.print_headline: Soccer Legend Pelé Sues Samsung Over Image in Newspaper Ad
